alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:51AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mitchell, southwestern Howard, northern Floyd and northwestern Chickasaw Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 751 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rudd, or 11 miles west of Charles City, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Floyd around 800 AM CDT. Osage around 805 AM CDT. Riceville around 815 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, County B 17 And Bell Avenue, Idlewilde State Park, Howardville, Brownville, County Roads T 54 And A 31, County Roads B 20 And T 26, Highways 9 And 218, Colwell County Park and Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
